p: Where ΔG Bind is the binding free energy; ΔE MM is the interaction energies such as ΔE vdw (van der Waals interaction energy) and ΔE elec (electrostatic interaction energy) between the protein and drug complex; ΔG sol is the solvation energy comprising ΔG GB (polar components) and ΔG SA (non-polar components); TΔS is the entropy change at temperature T.
